fieldDefinition: Name of deployment spot. Unique code for each deployment group
Local or common name of the sampling location
Number of units deployed at each location
Number of items removed after 1 hour
Number of units recovered at end of experiment
Cumulative number items removed after 24 hours
Name of the individual who deployed and collected the experiment
General notes about the weather on deployment/retrieval
Additional notes about the location, dive conditions, photos
File names of the recordings if video was collected
